overview: Join Tenderheart and the rest of your favorite cuddly Care Bears as they take you on a journey of fun and adventure and astonish you with magic and wizardry! Our heroic furry friends must overcome the dastardly Professor Coldheart and help their new friends find happiness before it is too late! Features 3 episodes: The Magic Shop, Braces, and The Lucky Charm.
title: Care Bears: Tenderheart Tales
